page.title: 09AMERICAN SCHOOLS (cont).
page.content: school where they are able to choose which subjects to take.The school offers a wide range of subjects for these years.These include sociology, psychology,economics,international relations and British history.The learning of a language is only comp- ulsory for the first 2 years of high school.The high school has a large gymnasium which can accomodate the 150 pupils who use it.The pupils play typically American sports as in the primary school. {INTEGRATION Because of the mixture of religions neither school has an assembly.The pupils and teachers are of mixed nationality,however most are American. The school tries to incorporate many of the Scottish holidays into their year,but this does become difficult sometimes.
